featured.text: A giant egg-timer will be set up in the Place de la Concorde and its sand will begin running after a solar eclipse scheduled on April 11, 1999.

definition.zh_def: 計時器，一種用於計量時間的裝置或工具。
definition.en_def: A device or tool used to measure time intervals.
definition.example: I set a timer for 20 minutes to bake the cake.
